StringTable.Label: CrusadeMercenary_Dec
StringTable.String: The Smuggler has a curious ability for moving unseen in ports throughout the galaxy. The ability is perhaps better called "bribery" but The Smuggler prefers being mysterious about it, so here we are.

StringTable.Label: CrusadeMercenary_ShortDec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Shiprange_Icon] Very Fast [ICON=Shiprange_Icon] Extremely long ship range.

StringTable.Label: CrusadeMercenaryShip_Dec
StringTable.String:
The Ship of the The Smuggler.
[ICON=Shiprange_Icon] Very Fast [ICON=Shiprange_Icon] Extremely long ship range.
